entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 374.00

Description

  • Rustic wood grain finish with black metal accents
  • Stationary and adjustable hooks allow for personalized storage
  • Built in bench for ease
  • Shelving on top and bottom allow for many storage options
  • Metal grate bottom shelf is perfect for shoes
  • Great option for an entryway, mudroom or hallways
  • Scratch guards for floor protection
  • Easy assembly

Eliminate the mess in your hallway with this rustic-styled coat and shoe hall tree. This classic yet trendy piece has a convenient bench seat and a metal grate shelf for storing shoes. This hall tree also has stationery as well as adjustable hooks for organizing clothes, hats, or purses. The mixed material finishing is a fresh take on a trendy industrial design with rustic wood-like elements. Position the hat and coat stand in your hallway or mudroom, it works well in both small or larger spaces, for all your entryways storage needs.
